attributes.action: call a halt to pointless online petitions which he probably doesn't read anyway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people are fed up with being innundated with requests to sign online petitions.
These petitions provide the illusion that by voicing their opinions the electroate can influence the direction of public policy, when in fact, the government can and will do as they please.
Let's face it, if thousands of people marching through the capital can't change the minds of these people, a load of comments on a web page certainly won't.
Direct democracy is dead folks, so sign this petition now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
